content: original sitehttps://ethereumpow.org/phishing sitehttps://ethereumpw.org/How the scam works:when connecting to the site, scammers ask you for a private key, seed phrase or json file with a passwordHow not to fall for scammersAfter taking a snapshot of the network, transfer your ethereum and tokens to another secure wallet and then use the private key from the old wallet for use in EthereumPoW wallets.
